This app sucks

The app worked great for a couple of months. Now it will no longer allow you to view the cameras. If you read back through the older reviews, this is a common problem. I see many folks are having the system crash, mine is not crashing. I can log in just fine, but when trying to watch the cameras, I get the dreaded "connect failed." The app is connecting to the DVR just fine, but will not allow me to view the cameras. The XVIM cameras on Amazon will only work with this app. DO NOT PURCHASE THAT SYSTEM if you plan on needing remote view through this app for longer than a month or two. The XVIM cameras aren't bad in and of themselves, but trying to view away from home isn't worth the headache. Buy another brand with a better app.

The App is super easy to use. The challenge is the setup. You'd need to setup 2 versions on your device one for home use, which assumeing you have wifi, which will generate a public IP address for your connection. You'd also need your ISP to enable port forwarding, which allows you outside access to the device, for example when you not at home or using your mobile data to access the cameras when using a different IP. I personally tried a few apps, this one is the easiest.
